name: The Pawnee
startIntroPart1: You stand before Chaticks si Chaticks!
declaringWar: If it is blood you thirst for then I shall drown you in it.
introduction: The Pawnee have not welcomed you to our lands tresspasser.
afterPeace: Are you sure you want to stop fighting?
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: The Cherokee
declaringWar: Then we will go to war!.
afterPeace: Come let us smoke and renew our friendship.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: The Crow
startIntroPart1: We, the children of the Beaked One, will fulfill our bestowed destiny.
startIntroPart2: Bilítaachiia iichiaxxó Akbaatatdía koó daasée bíilukaa.
declaringWar: Akbaatatdia will strike you down alongside us!
attacked: You dare attack our sacred land? May Akbaatatdia protect us against you!
defeated: It seems we were not the chosen of Akbaatatdia.. Very well.
neutralLetsHearIt: Our ears are open to your words.
We shall see what you have to offer.
neutralNo: No, we do not want this.
hateNo: We do not wish to communicate or cooperate with you
afterPeace: Let us celebrate this peace with a race of horses!
tradeRequest: A resource for a resource for both our people to prosper?
